item.title: Terror At Oakheart
item.description:
About This Game


The renowned slasher horror films of the 1980s and 1990s serve as a source of inspiration for Terror at Oakheart. The community of Oakheart has been terrorized by Teddy, a masked serial killer. As the body count rises, you discover there is more going on here than just a man in a mask killing helpless teenagers.


The side-scrolling, pixel-based game Terror At Oakheart aims to replicate the experience of watching an 80s horror movie. You will play a variety of characters throughout the game, and all of them will perish horribly at the hands of Teddy, a psychotic serial murderer who is under the sway of a Lovecraftian beast. You will move through a number of set pieces in the Town of Oakheart, such as Teddy's house, the nearby police station, a ranger station, camp areas, and more!

Uncover the truth and fight to survive in this unique pixel-based horror game full of gruesome gore and fearful frights!


Enjoy Chapter 1 and the prologue for free as part of the Terror At Oakheart demo! Available now!


Play as a cast of characters who square off against Teddy. Who will survive, and who will be killed in the most horrific ways?

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2530430/Terror_At_Oakheart/

item.title: Mysteryville
item.description:
About This Game

Mysteryville is a classic Hidden Object game that charges you with the task of finding required items buried in various chaotic locations.
Mysterious puzzles, hidden object searches, and a funny adventure are waiting for you!

Something very strange is going on in the town of Mysteryville and as the ace reporter for Countryside Life Magazine, it's up to you to learn the truth!
As you question the strange local townspeople to collect information for your article it doesnâ€™t take long for you to discover that something isnâ€™t quite right in this charming little townâ€¦ as well as, just how dangerous being a journalist can be.
Your seemingly simple assignment unfolds into a full-blown adventure as you try to learn the secret of the Black Lotus and its ancient prophecy.

Discover new possibilities as you untangle the mystery's tricky plots and solve all of the gameâ€™s Puzzles!
Go through 21 locations, interview the townâ€™s residents, figure out their clues and find all the evidence that you need to solve the mystery of the vanishing cats.
With hours of hide-and-seek fun, bizarre characters, and incredible graphics, Mysteryville is a surprising experience for all your senses.

This mysterious crime story and classic hidden object game will be appreciated by cats and kitten lovers.

Features:
- Exciting Hidden Object game - try to find all the clues!
- Mysterious gameplay
- Detective crime story
- Over 20 of different locations
- Gripping soundtrack

Only a true detective can find the missing felines!

item.title: Dicefolk
item.description:
About This Game

Dicefolk is a tactical roguelite game based on customizable dice and monster-catching mechanics. On your adventure as a Chimera Summoner, you'll meet dozens of unique and powerful creatures that you can recruit to create the perfect team.

Play as Alea, a young Dicefolk hero who discovers her ability to befriend Chimera and fight back against evil forces threatening humanityâ€™s extinction.





Embark on a thrilling quest to save humanity from the grasp of an evil sorcerer. Build a team from over 100 unique, hand-drawn Chimera to suit your playstyle. Unlock all the talismans to uncover the mystical secrets behind the Chimerasâ€™ existence.




With a large variety of Chimeras to befriend and command, you'll need to strategize and adapt your playstyle to suit each battle. From tough tanks to speedy attackers, each Chimera brings a unique set of abilities to the table. Your tactical choices will determine your success in battle!




Itâ€™s all up to you! Customize your dice for maximum influence over your Chimerasâ€™ attacks and abilities. Control the order in which battles play out and choose when parties take action. Dicefolk defies RNG and gives you unprecedented influence on the roll of the dice!




Each playthrough offers its own rewards, and the Chimeras you encounter in one run can be entirely different than those you find in another. With different Chimeras comes different strategies to assemble your team for the perfect run!

item.title: Code Zodiac
item.description:
About This Game



The Zodiac System is breaking. Only you can fix it.

Play as a young engineer named Leo and fight deadly robots on a quest to save your home planet from the sinister plans of The Stranger.



Boss fights only. Master a fluid and satisfying combat system to take down 10 increasingly difficult bosses.

Slash, shoot, and dodge your way to victory. Land melee attacks to replenish your ammo, then unleash a barrage of long-range attacks at your enemy. This short-range, long-range system infuses boss fights with a steady rhythm and keeps you in the action.

Full animation canceling and freedom of movement means you'll never lose to a cheap shot. Learn your enemy's movements and defeat them through skill.



Leo's planet is a robot-powered utopia, but not all is as it seems.

Talk with locals and discover the source of the Zodiac System's malfunctions.

Get to know a colorful and diverse cast of characters brought to life through hand-drawn portraits.





Join Leo on a globe-trotting adventure across Verge.

Treat your eyes to a beautiful pixel-art world, calling back to the classics of the 16-bit era.

Tune your ears to over a dozen tracks of pulse-pounding and nostalgia-inducing original music.

FEATURES

- 10 unique and challenging boss encounters
- A compelling sci-fi story about the cost of progress
- Responsive and fluid combat
- Pixel-perfect art style and hand-drawn characters
- Completely original soundtrack

item.title: Now Open! Horror House
item.description:
About This Game

This is a simulation management + tower defense game where you play as the "Haunted House Owner." Your task is to faint visitors who come to challenge the haunted house using various frightening mechanisms and props. Unlock different scare devices and strategically place them in the appropriate scenes, continuously upgrading and expanding the venue to create an unbeatable haunted house.
The main gameplay involves scaring visitors, accumulating wealth, and improving and expanding your haunted house.
You can adjust your business strategy by setting ticket prices, various events, and gifts to achieve the most ideal operational effect at the moment.
As the game progresses, visitors will become increasingly braver, so ensuring that the haunted house is not conquered by visitors is your biggest challenge.

item.title: Run Pizza Run
item.description:
About This Game


How long have you waited for a delivery of juicy and delicious pizza?

Welcome to the world of speed, adrenaline, and the most delicious pizza! In "Run Pizza Run," you will find yourself in the role of a brave delivery driver embarking on a dangerous adventure to deliver fresh pizza to specified locations. However, on your path, you will encounter not only hungry customers but also ruthless road monsters - fast and chaotically moving vehicles ready to knock you down at any moment.



Your mission is to skillfully maneuver amid this bustling automotive chaos, where not only your maneuvering skills are at stake but also freshly baked pizza. The more pizza you deliver, the more satisfied customers you will earn.

"Run Pizza Run" is not just a game, it's a real challenge for lovers of extreme adventures. Are you ready to accept the challenge and prove that you are the perfect pizza delivery driver in the most incredible conditions? Open the door and set off on a race for the most delicious pizza in town, where each delivery is a real adventure!

item.title: Alone in the crowd
item.description:
About This Game


Settled on a dystopian future, Alone in the Crowd is a puzzle simulation investigative thriller, where you use a weird variety of gadgets to satisfy this mysterious, self proclaimed friendly AI character.

Confused and scared, you wake up in a strange room filled with all kinds of machinery.
You can't remember what happened, but this secret messenger starts helping you.
There's a lot of questions you want to ask him, but first, he needs your help.
Equipped with surveillance technology, youÂ´re asked to search for specific citizens from the "Box".

Features:
-Play it like a point and click adventure with multiple puzzles to resolve.
-Print and manipulate documents to influence a citizen status.
-Dialogue with boxy, an anonymous character willing to explain you what happened to you and everything else.
-Search multiple cities database for specific citizens' information.
-Play footage from multiple surveillance cameras spread out through the city.
-Play a unique seeded campaign every time you start over.

item.title: SLIPPY THE FROG ğŸ¸ğŸ’¦
item.description:
About This Game

WHOLESOME MINIGAMES / CUTE COMEDY ADVENTURE


You control Slippy the square, soaking, frog as he travels the land solving peoples problems by entering their mind mini games.




Gameplay

  • MIND MINI GAMES - you gotta hop in their heads and fix their problems
  • FRIENDS - Slippy makes, like, a million friends on the way
  • FBI WORK - Slippy is stepping in for the FBI on this job, so the stakes are pretty high
  • FROGS - money back guarantee if there isn't at least one frog in your game
  • PARTY - after completing his job, SLIPPY attends a rad party

Short Game
40 hour games? YAWN - Slippy is short and jam packed with stuff to do.



Interactive
SLIPPY is a fully interactable piece of software known as a computer game.


Thank you for playing my game!
I've loved making this game so thank you for checking it out :D <3

item.title: Northern Tales 6: Oath to the Gods Collector's Edition
item.description:
About This Game

Received a task from Odin to close the rift from which the evil creatures escaped, Ragnar descended into the bowels of the mountains. to the kingdom of the dwarves.
Ragnar told them about his mission and the dwarves let him through. As proof, he showed the amuleted gift by Odin himself.
On the way to the rift, Ragnar was in wait for various dangerous.
Finally reaching the rift, Ragnar threw the amulet into the rift, a flash appeared and the evil was sealed. The dwarves wanted to repay Ragnar for his help and arranged a grand feast.
The next morning, Ragnar said goodbye to the leader of the dwarves. Then the dwarves opened an ancient portal that led to the surface.


Key Features:
- 40 diverse, colorful levels
- Redesigned graphics
- Intriguing plot
- Historical background
- Hidden objects
- A variety of game modes
- Dynamic gameplay
- 5 different bonus levels
- Exclusive wallpapers for your desktop

item.title: Spellarium 2
item.description:
About This Game

That's the Part 2 of our successfull Spellarium series. Our world consists of 6 elements: the Earth, Water,Fire,Light,Darkness and Water. So, we need to create the 7th element.
The game has 110 Match 3 levels plus Solitaires, Spot the Difference and Hidden Objects scenes.
Plus a nice town to build.

item.title: Curse Errant
item.description:
About This Game



"Curse Errant" is an RPG game produced by ãï½ã‚‹ã‚·ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼ and published by Hanabi games.



In her quest to learn the ways of chivalry, the red-haired knight Giselle found herself serving under Sharon's princess-to-be, Lana. Together, they will uncover the secrets clouding the lands and learn the true meaning behind their destinies. No curse is too powerful to hinder them, no sword is too sharp to cut them down. This is the story of the Curse-Errant Knight.

This game is a role-playing game featuring a turn-based combat system. It is characterized by a rich and immersive storyline, excellent visual effects and atmospheric music.







  • Turn-based RPG Combat with an TP Management Feature
  • Exploration
  • Side Quests
  • Events

item.title: Command Adventures: Starship
item.description:
About This Game

The Intergalactic Game of Combat and Acquisition! Explore and conquer unknown regions of the galaxy.


It is the year 2127, galactic standard time, at the close of the Galactic Wars. You purchase a starship to explore regions unknown and to extract untold riches from distant galaxies. Your treacherous enemies plot revenge. Pirates and bloodthirsty alien beings wander the universe, randomly attacking ships like yours, plundering peaceful planets and killing without warning. It is a gritty and nasty period. You will not let that deter you. The time is now to bravely go forth, to explore and seek your fortune!

  • Never see the same game twice! Completely regenerate the universe at will!
  • Custom-configure more than 50 ships to your requirements!
  • More than 80 weapons, shields, and engine systems!
  • Conquer more than 50 worlds with 6 different types of texture-mapped planetary surfaces!

item.title: Battle Marine
item.description:
About This Game

Overview

Battle Marine is a simple naval barrage STG.
Enjoy a somewhat retro yet new and exhilarating game experience by firing a barrage of shots, inducing explosions, sweeping with powerful lasers, and automatically collecting medals (recovery and score) by jumping.
Destroying enemies consecutively within a certain time frame will result in a HIT combo. Aim for 999 HITs!
Your rank will be assessed according to the results of your play. Aim for the rank of FLEET ADMIRAL!

Controls

This game can be played with a gamepad or keyboard.

Use the cursor keys to move left and right, press B to shoot, and A to jump.
Press and hold the B button to charge the laser, and release it when the charge is maxed out to fire the laser.
Press A briefly for small jumps and long for large jumps.
Button assignments can be freely customized in the SteamInput menu.

Keyboard Controls (Windows)

  • Cursor keys: D-Pad (Can be changed in the key configuration)
  • X key: A button (Can be changed in the key configuration)
  • Z key: B button (Can be changed in the key configuration)
  • Space key: START button (Can be changed in the key configuration)
  • ESC key: SELECT button (Can be changed in the key configuration)
  • CTRL+X: Exit the game (CTRL+Q, CTRL+C also work)
  • CTRL+R: Reset
  • Alt+Enter: Toggle full screen (CTRL+F also work)
  • CTRL+A: Toggle screen aspect mode
  • CTRL+S: Screen Resolution Settings
  • CTRL+K: Key configuration for the Keyboard

Keyboard Controls (Linux and macOS)

  • Cursor keys: D-Pad
  • X key: A button
  • Z key: B button
  • Space key: START button
  • ESC key: SELECT button
  • Q: Exit the game
  • R: Reset

Notes on the Linux and macOS version

  • Supported screen displays are for Full-Screen and Aspect-Fit only.
  • Keyboard input key assignments cannot be changed.

Detailed Gameplay

  • When you destroy an enemy, a green or red medal will appear.
  • Taking the green medal will restore your LIFE.
  • Your score will increase if you take a red medal.
  • If you keep defeating enemies within a certain time (120 frames), your combo will increase and medals will be collected automatically when you reach 100 HITs or more.
  • Medals are also automatically collected by jumping.
  • You are invincible during the laser (after the firing motion is complete).
  • Unlike normal STGs, explosions also have hit points.
  • If you keep collecting green medals while your LIFE is full, the red medal's base points will continue to increase.
  • The number of crowns at the bottom of the screen will increase for every 16 green medals you take while your LIFE is full.
  • The maximum number of crowns displayed is 30 (480 green medals), but the maximum number of crowns is 4,095 (65,535 green medals).
  • When you collide with enemy bullets, your LIFE will be reduced and the number of crowns will be strongly reduced.
  • With the exception of some enemies (crabs), red medals will appear when enemies are killed by lasers.
  • Obtaining a medal also resets the combo duration to 120 frames

Video distribution, etc.

There are no restrictions on the distribution of this game on TV, YouTube, or other video distribution sites.
Of course, there are no restrictions on monetization.
There is no need to contact the author prior to or after the event.
Similarly, there are no restrictions on publishing screenshots in magazines, web media, social media, etc.

About VGS-Zero

This game is made with the SDK called VGS-Zero.
VGS-Zero is a virtual game machine with a fast 16MHz Z80 CPU, old-fashioned VDP (Video Display Processor) and VGS (chip-tuned sound system).
There may be many 8-bit style games, but the games made with VGS-Zero are real 8-bit games.
If you want to develop games like Battle Marine, please try to develop games with VGS-Zero.
Games you develop with VGS-Zero can be sold on Steam (Windows, Linux and macOS) using the VGS-Zero SDK for Steam.

item.title: Tales of Sintra: The Dark Vortex
item.description:
About This Game

All life forms based on light are in danger. An ancient prophecy has been fulfilled and the dark vortex has been created.

Only the Sintra brotherhood has the power to fight this evil. They will send their best warrior to put an end to the threat.

Search for the legendary weapons. Get the spells of ice and fire by defeating their guardians and enchant your weapons with their power.

- Fight with bow, sword and shield or with two swords.
- Enchant your weapons with spells
- Search for runes to further empower your weapons.
- Puzzles that will test your cunning.
- Labyrinths, dungeons, dark fortresses, dragons, golems?

All the ingredients to live a great adventure in VR.

All with a careful environment that will make you feel that you are really trapped in a world where the darkness of the dark vortex does not stop spreading and threatens you at every corner.

item.title: GURAGURA ODEN
item.description:
About This Game

Guragura Oden" is a casual balance puzzle game.
Pile up the ingredients high in the unstable shaking earthenware pot.

Ingredients
Ingredients in this game are life forms with faces and hands.
It would be nice if you could take care of them.

Hand-holding
If you connect the hands of ingredients, they are connected and your score will be increased.
If the ingredients are the same, they can be connected by other means than hands, so think carefully about where to drop them.

â– Exchange of pots and pans
When all the quota ingredients are placed in an earthenware pot, you can "exchange pots" to move to the next level of pots.
The score is calculated when you exchange pots, so you should pile up as many pots as possible before exchanging pots.

â– Skewer
The ingredients and connected ingredients that have been skewered will be fixed to the pot and will not fall out.

Fever skewer
Each time you pile up ingredients, the gauge will accumulate and you can use the "Fever Skewer".
The ingredients that are hit with the "Fever Skewer" will disappear from the pot, so be sure to use it properly.

The game is over when the ingredients fall out of the pot!
Relax and enjoy the game while looking at the cute ingredients.

item.title: Simulator Of A Person Who Is Taking Online Course To Study How To Lose Weight
item.description:
About This Game

Because of overweight, You're locked in a room with an online course about weight loss. Look for clues in the room and escape!

Main Content

  • A weight loss course
  • Small quantities puzzles
  • Some weight loss related notes

Feedback

  • Joshua: Next time you could just simulate the people playing the game.
  • Game producer: Good idea, could simulate a person who is closing the game and giving praise.
  • Yang: It's so abstract!

About me

An indie game producer who focuses on serious game about study. Welcome to follow my developer page~~

item.title: Sword Princess Sistina
item.description:
About This Game




1,000 years ago, Demon God Loptr terrorized the world, tormenting and killing millions of humans with his demonic army. Saint Orianne had to call upon all of her power to defeat him, since no one else stood a chance.

Now Loptr has returned, and his first move has already wiped out one of the world's strongest armies. However, it will be some time before he regains his full strength, so his victory is not yet certain.

Sword Princess Sistina is a fairly sheltered young woman, but her combat skills are first class. She sets out on a journey to discover Loptr's weakness and prevent his resurrection, together with her childhood friend Luis and his best friend, Rayne. Luis has the knowledge of a scholar, while Rayne's street smarts are unrivaled.

The three of them will encounter fantastical monsters, religious zealots with their own ideas of how Loptr should be confronted, and other demons who scheme against humanity on their way to fight the Demon God. Through their combined wits and abilities, they must save the Human World or be annihilated by the demons!


In this RPG, every weapon you obtain will teach you new abilities for use in battle. Use status effects and formulate strategies to take down your enemies!

Explore and solve riddles to gain more powerful weapons and items; shops aren't the only source of superior equipment. Just be warned: while bosses have fixed strength, regular enemies grow stronger as Sistina does! Simply grinding won't be enough to secure victory and see Loptr and his underlings defeated.





Explore a Fantastic World
The Human World is split up into multiple continents, and the areas you discover may contain quests that grant weapons and armor you can use to defeat the demons.

Choose Your Strategy
You can fight Loptr with brute strength or follow the clever plan crafted by modern authorities. It's unknown which path will lead to the better outcome...

item.title: Arena 9th
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to the AUTO-CARD Competition of The Ninth Universe. You can show your skills, enter a higher level of competition, and strive to win the glory of the universe championship.
Don't go to The Eighth Universe. The King of Stomach is not suitable for you. Their meals are calculated by tons. You will not only fail to win the place, but may also become the fresh P-R-O-T-E-I-N!
Don't go to The Tenth Universe, the invisible record of 1600 earth years. If you go there, you may not see anyone!
......
The Ninth Universe is a peace-loving universe. All disputes here can be solved by a game. Be the next champion. There is one seat left on the space flight.

Description

Arena 9 is a strategy card game with misplaced PVP matches, where you can simulate recruiting soldiers, forming teams, defeating enemies, eliminating opponents, gaining higher rankings, advancing to more advanced matches, and finally winning the title of Universe Champion.
The game contains 32 hero cards, 61 soldier cards, 21 spell cards, 14 mask cards, and 24 bonus cards.
All game battle data comes from real players, and there are no "dummies" or "AI" in the game. You'll be matched with other players who have recently completed the same difficulty and received the same resources, ensuring that you don't have to spend a lot of time waiting while playing smoothly. At the same time, after your match is completed, your data will also be acquired and played by other players, and the elimination data of the game is also the real battle data of history.
Since the game is made by myself, the game does not contain special effects, and art resources are not abundant.

Rules of the Game

1. Your character: You play as a contestant from a different universe in the game;
2. Choose a hero: Choose one of the 7 random heroes as the commander and the other as the adjutant;
3. Hero Skills: Commander comes with two skills, Adjutant comes with one skill, which can help strengthen your clan;
4. Soldier Card: You need to place the soldier card in the soldier's position to fight;
5. Mask Cards: Masks can give your soldiers extra skill effects;
6. Spell Cards: Spells can directly strengthen your soldiers, or obtain additional resources;
7. Enemies: Each turn will assign you an enemy, and soldiers on both sides will fight the enemy;
8. Hero Health: Hero Health will be lost when fighting enemies, and will be eliminated when health is reduced to 0, and the later the elimination ranking;
9. Promotion: If you rank higher in the competition, you can advance to a more advanced tournament, the highest level of the competition is the Cosmic Finals;
10. Format: The competition is set up in 9 competition levels, and the number of participants in each level is different, which are "Village League(20)", "Township League(30)", "County League(40)", "Municipal League(50)", "Provincial League(60)", "National League(70)", "Star League(80)", "Galaxy League(90)", "Universe League(100)".

item.title: Word2
item.description:
About This Game

Browse the Bible in most languages and many versions!

Reading mode or typing mode.

Type verses, improve typing speed and store your best and average WPM. Typing only tested with English alphabet plus some testing in Korean.

Typing is chill; timer stops after .5 seconds with no keypresses.

I love Jesus!

item.title: Blood Kiss
item.description:
About This Game

[Story]



"You, there's something sweet... and delicious about your scent."


In a twist of fate far from an inheritance, "you" find yourself burdened with sudden debt. Just when all seems lost, an opportunity arises that could turn your life around.
The catch? You must survive a detention center where vampires that have lost all control are imprisoned...

In the vampire's lair, will "your" future be fraught with danger, or could there possibly be a chance for romance?

[Character]



The dangerously sexy head vampire of noble lineage, "Dayn"


The kind-hearted half-vampire who sees himself as a monster, "Gray"


The vampire with a complex about his origins, mysteriously adorable, "Ruel"


Dayn's right-hand man, a loyal vampire, "Eden"

- Embark on a genuine otome romance simulation game where 'your' choices determine the ending.
- Dive into a female-oriented visual novel where your decisions unfold unique storylines with four men.
- In BloodKiss, you are the protagonist. Craft your own love story.
- With over 200 choices, explore each character's ending, special illustrations, and hidden finales.
- Begin your perilous yet romantic dates with these four men today.

item.title: Metal Voyager
item.description:
About This Game

Features:
Original Heavy Metal Soundtrack:
Blast enemies by shredding and wailing your astral guitar against a rolling backing track. Butt-loads of unique riffs and jams to destroy your enemies with during your voyage. Features a full original soundtrack from Dante Morris.

Hand Drawn Retro Style:
Every character and sprite is hand drawn and animated giving everything a fluid, psychedelic look.

Randomized Enemy & Item Spawns:
Stages will throw you something different each time.

Astral Space Journey:
Take on epic bosses and embark on an epic mind bending trek into the unknown.



Arcade Mode: Voyage across our solar system and beyond as you soar beyond our celestial neighbors into the deep void.

Hard Mode: Mastered the normal difficulty? Crank up the challenge with Hard mode.

Endless Mode: Complete Hard difficulty and unlock this mode to go even further into the unknown.

Stage Select Mode: Unlock various floating pieces of detritus by racing for gold medals!

Bonus bike stages! Astral aquarium! Easter Eggs! Achievements! Etc!!



A casual indie game from a solo developer In the spirit of game series like Geometry Wars, Metal Slug, Darius and R-Type.

item.title: Dark Elf Historia
item.description:
About This Game

A classic RPG about one dark elf girl's journey to save a boy!

  • 10+ hours of gameplay
  • A JRPG from veteran doujin creators

SUMMARY

Our story starts when peace has finally taken hold of the world after the war. The former mercenary and dark elf Fornelia, battle-worn and looking for a place to die, saves a young man named Ruse from a monster attack.

Follows Forneliaâ€™s life together with Ruse.

CHARACTERS


Fornelia (Voice: Ao Inukai)
A dark elf former mercenary.
During the World War, she was a mercenary-for-hire, doing nothing but fighting.
When the war ended, she spent her days taking jobs from the town guilds and traveling the world.
She saved a boy named Ruse by accident while working as a monster exterminator, and the two have now made the Oruc Kingdom their home.

Ruse (Voice: -)
A young man who lives with Fornelia.
A few years ago, he ended up being saved by Fornelia when he was attacked by a monster.
At first he did not open up his heart to her at all, but with time, he eventually thawed towards her.
He's short for his age due to undernourishment, and reads books at home all the time.
His dream is to become a scholar one day.

* This game was made using RPG Maker VX Ace and includes the RPG Maker VX Ace RTP (Run-Time Package). No additional download is required to play.

item.title: Piczle Cross: Story of Seasons
item.description:
About This Game

The critically acclaimed Piczle series presents Piczle Cross: Story of Seasons; addictive nonogram logic-puzzles celebrating the beloved farm life game series


Enjoy the bucolic charm of Story of Seasons while relaxing and exercising your brain with classic logic-puzzles. All your favourite villagers and bachelors, tools and crops, animals and upgrades in nonogram form will provide you with countless hours of puzzling!



With 350 puzzles featuring a wealth of different Story of Seasons mainstays youâ€™ll have a veritable pasture-full of puzzling pleasure!



As you clear puzzles the seasons progress, your farm expands, livestock appears and crops grow.Â 



5 unlockable collage puzzles celebrate Story of Seasonsâ€™ festivals by combining dozens of puzzles into a bigger picture.



True to the Piczle series, Piczle Cross; Story of Seasons provides the most feature-rich and option-abundant experience available to cater the puzzling experience to your exact liking. From hiding away the timer to correcting your mistakes, from choosing the puzzlesâ€™ themes to managing how completed clues are marked off, you can play exactly how you want. There is no wrong way to play!



Clearing specific puzzles will unlock entries in the in-game 100+ page almanac that celebrates all your favourite characters and critters from the Story of Seasons games.Â 



Keep an eye on your progress with detailed statistics and achievements. Replay puzzles to improve your time, or to hone your skills without using helpful gameplay options.

item.title: Flying Ferret
item.description:
About This Game

What is Flying Ferret?

In this action game, a mysterious ferret with special jumping ability and its friends are made to jump and fly at high speed from island to island over the blue ocean to fly farther and farther.

Story

There was a mysterious group of animals living on a certain sea.
They had incredible jumping ability and lived by flying over the island.
They did not have this jumping ability when they were children, but it came as they grew older.
Therefore, they all had trouble controlling it at first, but with practice they learned to jump well.
There seems to be one ferret here who is practicing hard with his friends.

How to play

The mysterious animals that live on this island can jump amazingly high and far.
Hold down the jump button to make them jump higher.
When the altitude starts to drop, hit the jump button repeatedly and the ferrets will try their best to go farther.
The ferret will try its best to go far away from the island.
If you jump at the moment of landing, you will get a combo and jump at a higher speed.
Keep jumping to reach beyond the horizon!
If you fall into the sea, the game is over! One wrong decision can be fatal. You need to make a quick and accurate decision on which island to use as a foothold.

Video Submission and Distribution Guidelines

Please love ferrets.
You can distribute without permission. You can distribute this game without permission.
Growth Software is not responsible for any damage caused by posting or distributing videos of this game.
These guidelines are subject to change without notice.

item.title: Conversation With A Rock
item.description:
About This Game

Have a conversation with a rock in this funny piece of Interactive Fiction.

Key Features:
- Talk to a rock.
- Multiple Choices
- No goals other than the pursuit of good conversation.
- Funny.

What will can you talk to this rock about?:
Thatâ€™s a good question. ğŸ˜

ok but seriously, what can you talk to it about:
Thatâ€™s a spoiler, but there's 150 choices you can make.

About the author:
Samuel Leigh is a game developer, writer and adjunct professor based in New York.
His work spans from Interactive fiction, to puzzle and action games.
He thought that since this game did well on YouTube one time that he may as well experiment with putting it up on Steam. ğŸ¤ª

His other game, Moving Jigsaw Puzzles is available on Steam and is also very fun.

item.title: William and Sly
item.description:
About This Game

The hit Flash series reborn


William and Sly is an open-world 3D platformer based on the popular Flash games from the golden age of browser gaming. Remember those familiar, cozy adventures, reimagined in an entirely new style.

An open world to explore


Race through lush valleys, soaring mountains, peaceful coasts, and other wild landscapes as a fox in search of mushrooms. Play at your own pace and untangle the magical machinations of a dark enchantress.

A wholesome adventure


The game features fifteen new songs and over ten hours of gameplay! Created in Unreal Engine with all assets, music, and gameplay by indie developer Lucas Paakh.

item.title: Sakura Isekai Adventure
item.description:
About This Game

Akiâ€™s life is nothing to write home about. She lives in Tokyo, works at an office, and she whiles away her time playing MMOs. Aki isnâ€™t exactly happy with her lot in life, but itâ€™s all she knows, and sheâ€™s too tired from work to change it.

Aki is the last person youâ€™d expect to go on a magical adventureâ€¦

Until she gets hit by a truck.

After being mown down on her way home from work, Aki is summoned to the land of Anthem by a cat-eared witch called Mina.

Mina is a talented mage whose skills far outstrip most others. She promises sheâ€™ll return Aki home in due course, after sheâ€™s had a chance to replenish her magical energy, but she wants Aki to do her a favor first.

The priestess Luna, whom Mina was entrusted with taking care of, has been kidnapped by malevolent forces, and Mina has no idea where she is.

Mina enlists the help of Aki, our heroine, and Scarlet, a cheerful foxgirl, to track down Luna and punish the brigands who kidnapped her. Our trioâ€™s journey will be far from easy, however. Attacked by thieves, assaulted by slimes, and encumbered by Akiâ€™s own incompetence, Akiâ€™s new life in Anthem gets off to a poor start.

Can an awkward, unassuming office lady like Aki really become a hero?


Aki is the unwilling heroine of our tale. Sheâ€™s quiet and soft-spoken, and she finds it hard to assert herself. Bullied by her co-workers and criticized by her parents for her lack of ambition, Aki struggles to see herself as a warrior.

Contrary to her demure appearance, however, Aki is handy with a sword, being a kendo champion in her teenage years. Itâ€™s been a long time since she last wielded a blade, however, and Aki isnâ€™t too confident about her abilities.

Can she really pull this off?


Mina is a highly talented mage, and sheâ€™s the catalyst behind this tale.

Mina might be a prodigy, but sheâ€™s proud and haughty alongside it. Sheâ€™s aware of her own strengths and she doesnâ€™t try to downplay them. As a result, she can come across as being arrogant.

Mina is cold and aloof to most people, but she absolutely adores Luna. Sheâ€™s determined to find Luna again, no matter how long it takes, and she doesnâ€™t care who she drags along with her.


Scarlet is the third addition to Minaâ€™s party, and she she has no shortage of energy. Sheâ€™s a perpetually cheerful foxgirl who fancies herself as a brave knight, who was kicked out of her former party for being a little too enthusiastic while fighting monsters.

Scarlet is a fierce fighter whoâ€™s an asset to have on the battlefieldâ€¦

When she isnâ€™t scuppering well-laid plans by charging in like a lunatic, that is.

item.title: Luna's Light
item.description:
About This Game

Luna's Light is a classic 2D pixel metroidvania with a focus on the main story. Luna is a brave and daring hunter, and her main weapon is a bow with different types of arrows, suitable for solving different tasks. On her way she will encounter many dangers - wild animals, bandits, bosses and platforming.

Game Features


  • Different types of arrows, bows and clothes!
  • Saving the game at bonfires and replenishing health with potions.
  • Secondary quests help you get to know the game world better and strengthen your character.
  • Atmospheric and diverse pixel locations with their own history.

Message from the developer


Hi all! My wife and I made this game together and put all our talent into it, making it exactly the way we would like it. We hope you like it too!

item.title: Spellstrife
item.description:
About This Game

(Try out the demo!)

Spell words to summon monsters




The starting letter of your word determines which of 26 unique monsters you will summon. Uncommon letters tend to be stronger, but each monster is useful in different scenarios. The length of the word determines the monster's HP and attack power.

Cast spells to manipulate your letter tiles or change the battlefield




Learn a variety of spells during runs that can be cast during battle to help you find the tiles you need, spell the longest words available, or change the battlefield's terrain to give your monsters an advantage.

Upgrade your tiles with enchantments and affinities


After each battle, choose from various rewards that power up your tiles. Letter affinities mean you'll always have a letter in your pool, and tile enchantments give a variety of powers to your monsters. Choose carefully how to upgrade--you'll need to choose rewards that counter your upcoming enemies and synergize well together.

26 Starting Classes


Unlock a variety of starting classes, each with their own strengths and weaknesses.

Randomized runs keep things fresh


Randomized enemies, terrain, upgrades, and final boss battle give each run its own flavor.

item.title: Ultra Foodmess 2
item.description:
About This Game

Pack your bags and grab your passport!

You and your friends are going on a tasty trip around the world filled with chaos and laughter! Your favorite food characters are back in an even more epic and fun competition (now with a DASH action!)

Embark on this journey and welcome to Ultra Foodmess 2!

ABOUT THE GAME

Ultra Foodmess 2 brings back all the competitiveness of the first game, but now with a renewed look, new and chaotic game modes, in addition to several characters that are even more charismatic and fun.

Run, dash, shoot and push in this frantic party-game!

Play with up to 4 friends and select which modes around the world you want to battle, each one with its own crazy gameplay mechanics.

Fast, chaotic and fun, those are the words that define Ultra Foodmess 2, and you'll want to travel with your friends into this battle capable of providing hours of friendship-ruining fun.

10 GAME MODES FILLED WITH CHAOS

Face the unique challenges of each game mode as you travel the world! Each mode only lasts a few seconds, so you must be quick and attentive!

Collect and shoot donuts at your foes in Hollywood, play Foodball matches in Brazil, avoid deadly lasers in Japan and much more!
Each mode will surprise you in a new and delicious way!

BATTLE AGAINST THE AI

Don't have 4 friends to play with you? No problem! You can spice up your matches by adding Foodbots, an AI that will control your opponents.


CONTROL OPTIONS FOR EVERYONE

Our goal is that you can play however you like with up to 4 friends! And thinking about it, you can use both keyboard and controllers!

Furthermore, Ultra Foodmess 2 also supports Remote Play! So invite your friends and get the party started!

UNLOCKABLES!

Play matches to earn experience and unlock awesome new characters & accessories!

Play as classic characters like Sandy and Barry or be amazed at the new foods that have joined the gang!

item.title: Qyllscape
item.description:
About This Software

Qyllscape (verb): The act of an author becoming a traveler in another world.

All writing applications are designed to help writers progress towards their writing goals. Qyllscape supports writing efforts not by reinventing common functionality, but by offering a unique approach to a customizable, responsive writing environment that looks like a book.



Qyllscape lets you design your writing environment.


Change every setting to fit your preference.
  • All the fundamentals (page layout, font styles, etc.)
  • Colors for each aspect of the editor
  • Page titles and numbering
  • Single page and minimalist mode




Writing is a beautiful process.


Qyllscape was designed to be aesthetic, and is equipped with a unique candlelight tool that lets you match your external lighting environment. Helpful when you need to soften the editor for long writing sessions, or when you want to add a unique flair to your writing vlogs.

Don't worry. You can do this.


Here are a few other things that are included in the current version of Qyllscape.

  • Cloud saving between devices through Steam Cloud
  • Simple, experimental sound tools (Mechanical keyboard sound, fountain pen, ...)
  • Local backup system, including HTML creation for PDF/printing

Qyllscape is never finished, only abandoned.


The initial release of Qyllscape is intended to include all core features necessary to make progress on your writing project. With future updates, Qyllscape will be expanded on to offer even more customization and tooling. These are some features that are currently being experimented with:

  • Book border options/variety
  • Decorative environment stickers
  • Larger library of sound options
  • Allow users to upload resources and share with others (Background textures, environment stickers, etc.)
  • Improved project exporting

item.title: Chess Opening Repertoire Builder
item.description:
About This Game

Chess Opening Repertoire Builder or CORB is a chess app/game extracted from chess career simulation game Master of Chess.


It is designed as a helping tool for expanding, better understanding and training of your chess opening repertoire.

Features

  • Expand your opening repertoire via graph display of opening lines
  • Annotate moves in the graph
  • Search through official openings database
  • Test your knowledge of different openings by solving opening quizes
  • Play Chess Matches from preselected positions

item.title: Bunker's Shadow
item.description:
About This Game

The game is a First Person Shooter.In a huge dangerous underground, you need to save a little girl.Being lost in a huge bunker, the task is to survive and find the keys for the doors and find the way to the exit. An encounter with zombies and enemy soldiers is inevitable.

item.title: This is Normal
item.description:
About This Game

A free educational game that teaches about Self Managed Abortion in a compassionate way. Learn about abortion and how it is a normal, common, and safe part of healthcare. Interactive minigames help players understand the details.

item.title: Danger Ramps
item.description:
About This Game

Danger Ramps is inspired by classic 3D platformer games, but you play with a vehicle. Master control of your vehicle to navigate through colorful environments, collecting items without flipping over or falling into abysses.

  • Your vehicle has enhanced physics; improve your driving skills to progress in the game.
  • Explore vibrant scenarios featuring their own obstacles and challenges.
  • Collect the golden stars and all the black stars to advance to the next level.
  • Avoid flip over and defy gravity while traversing ramps and chasms.
  • Increase your score with each playthrough.

Some game considerations:

  • This is not a long game; however, advancing to the next level shouldn't be too easy.
  • Learning to control the vehicle is part of the game's mechanics.
  • It's possible to play it perfectly using only one hand on the keyboard.
  • Optimized for Xbox One controller. You can control acceleration and reverse using the controller's triggers.
